mapper.insert: insert into userskin (id, uid, sid, state) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select id, uid, sid, state from userskin
select * from userskin where uid=#{uid} and state=0
select * from userskin where uid=#{uid} and sid=#{sid}
